examples: I need to go to the bank to deposit this check.
The river bank was lined with willow trees.
Preciso ir ao banco para depositar este cheque.
A margem do rio estava alinhada com árvores de salgueiro.

suggested: I need to go to the bank to withdraw some money.
The bank of the river was covered in lush green vegetation.
The bank has a beautiful and imposing building downtown.
It's always good to have a savings account in the bank.
Investing in stocks and bonds through the bank is a smart move.
You can trust the bank with your money.
The bank approved my loan application.
